ModMetaData.name: Unofficial Chemfuel Expanded
ModMetaData.author: Fullhammer
ModMetaData.description:
"Vanilla Chemfuel Expanded is a small mod created to showcase what the new Pipe network code is capable" (c)
Unofficial Chemfuel Expanded is focused on making the original mod wider, and to develop ways to use the piping system for your petrol town. Chemstove, Chemsmelter, Chemshithing, Chemcrematorium, ability to refine chemfuel to neutroamine and then your useless neutroamine into synth-hypertextiles.
I know about rimefeller, but i like how vce works.
